comments:
Made a small textual change to a file. Erased the change. The 'Compare With Latest From HEAD' was 
still showing that there was a difference, but then the difference was empty or was white space.

So, I selected 'Replace With... -> Latest from HEAD'.

It complained and then I no longer had the file in question. I was able to go to the project and do an 
Update at that level, and it brought back the file, but this will not be an acceptable work-around, in 
general.

On Mac OS X 10.3.3 with Eclipse 3.0M7 (build id 200402122000).

from console:

!SESSION Mar 23, 2004 13:16:46.484 ---------------------------------------------
java.version=1.4.2_03
java.vendor=Apple Computer, Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=macosx, ARCH=ppc, WS=carbon, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments: -keyring /Users/ray/.eclipse_keyring -showlocation -data workspace
